ttScene.ttInitScript: vars:setVar("inkGunFinished","0") vars:setVar("drillFinished","0") vars:setVar("gearsFinished","0") vars:setVar("leverFinished","0") vars:setVar("steakFinished","0") vars:setVar("grinderFinished","0") vars:setVar("canMoveInkGun","0") vars:setVar("canMoveDrill","0") vars:setVar("canMoveSteak","0") vars:setVar("canMoveGrinder","0")

ttObject.ttActionsGroup:
onTouchesMoved>
isObjectInPlace lever brokenLever 2 rectRect replaceLever doNothing
